data.name: Aragami - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Aragami Original Soundtrack by Two Feathers.
Composed by Elvira Björkman and Nicklas Hjertberg.

Track List

  • 01: Aragami (Main Theme)
  • 02: Awakening
  • 03: Call of Yamiko
  • 04: Moreseli
  • 05: Remembrance of the Fox
  • 06: The Intruder
  • 07: A Reprieve in the Dark
  • 08: The Path of Shadows
  • 09: House of the Raven
  • 10: At the Other Side
  • 11: Yamiko’s Lullaby
  • 12: A Bell to Recall
  • 13: Shaded Woods
  • 14: Silent Leaf, Silent Dragon
  • 15: The Huntress
  • 16: Corridor of Elements pt.1
  • 17: Corridor of Elements pt.2
  • 18: Corridor of Elements pt.3
  • 19: Trapped!
  • 20: Crimson in the Mist
  • 21: Infiltrating Kyuryu
  • 22: Kyuryu
  • 23: Clash of Light and Shadow
  • 24: Fox Tears
  • 25: Steps to Ascension
  • 26: The Spirit of Vengeance
